user_query: I want to surprise my mom with a special gift for her birthday. Can you suggest some unique gift ideas for moms? Also, I need a recipe for a delicious cake. Can you provide me with a cake recipe that includes natural milk as one of the ingredients?

TaskList.description: Gather unique gift ideas for moms, focusing on categories like personalized items, experiences, or luxury goods.
Obtain a recipe for a delicious cake that includes natural milk as one of the ingredients.
